mapper.insert: insert into noti(noti_no, user_no, content, read, notitime ) values(seq_noti_no.nextval, #{userNo}, #{content}, 0, sysdate )
mapper.select: select noti_no notiNo, content, to_char(notiTime, 'yy-mm-dd hh24:mi') notiTime, read from noti where user_no = #{userNo} order by notiTime desc
select count(*) from noti where user_no = #{userNo} and read = 0
